mapper.select: SELECT p.id ,p.name ,p.category ,p.description ,p.content ,p.price ,p.stock ,p.created_at ,p.updated_at ,( SELECT id FROM files WHERE parent_table = 'products' AND parent_id = p.id AND is_main = 1 ) thumbnail_id ,( SELECT name FROM categories WHERE code = p.category ) category_name FROM products p ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.id ,p.name ,p.category ,p.description ,p.content ,p.price ,p.stock ,p.created_at ,p.updated_at ,( SELECT name FROM categories WHERE code = p.category ) category_name FROM products p WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.category, p.description, p.content, p.price, p.stock, p.created_at, p.updated_at, ( SELECT id FROM files WHERE parent_table = 'products' AND parent_id = p.id AND is_main = 1 LIMIT 1 ) thumbnail_id, ( SELECT name FROM categories WHERE code = p.category ) category_name FROM products p ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products ( id, name, category, description, content, price, stock ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{category}, #{description}, #{content}, #{price}, #{stock} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM products WHERE id IN ( ${id} )
